original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2381)@</color>  引氣凝盾，在武將週圍形成球形龜甲盾，在接下來的<color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(1511)@</color>秒內減少50%<color=#80cc00>物理傷害</color>。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2381)@</color> Bleeding air condensing shield, forming a spherical tortoise shield around the generals, in the next <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(1511)@</color><color=#80cc00>Physical damage</color> reduced by 60% in seconds.
